scripts.jekyll: cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --host $(ipconfig getifaddr en0) --port 5134 -l -o
scripts.jekyll_build: cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.preview: cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve --host $(ipconfig getifaddr en0) --port 5134 -l -o
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd vite && APP_ENV=development vite dev --host --port 5133" "cd public && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --host $(ipconfig getifaddr en0) --port 5134 -l -o"
scripts.deploy: cd vite && APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && [ -d _data ] || mkdir _data && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets
scripts.build: cd vite && APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && [ -d _data ] || mkdir _data && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.vite_dev_win: cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=development vite dev --host --port 5133
scripts.vite_build_win: cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=production vite build
scripts.jekyll_win: for /f "tokens=2 delims=:" %i in ('ipconfig ^| findstr "IPv4 Address"') do @set IP=%i && cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --host %IP% --port 5134 -l -o
scripts.jekyll_build_win: cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build -l -o
scripts.preview_win: for /f "tokens=2 delims=:" %i in ('ipconfig ^| findstr "IPv4 Address"') do @set IP=%i && cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll serve --host %IP% --port 5134 -l -o
scripts.dev_win: for /f "tokens=2 delims=:" %i in ('ipconfig ^| findstr "IPv4 Address"') do @set IP=%i && concurrently "cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=development vite dev --host %IP% --port 5133" "cd public && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --host %IP% --port 5134 -l -o --incremental --trace"
scripts.deploy_win: cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && [ -d _data ] || mkdir _data && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json && rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets
scripts.build_win: cd vite && cross-env APP_ENV=production vite build && cd ../public && [ -d _data ] || mkdir _data && mv dist/manifest.json _data/manifest.json &&  rm -rf assets && mv dist/assets assets && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
